description.narrative: This output aims at ensuring that at least 250 vulnerable cashew crop growers from Cacheu and Gabu regions obtain support in harvest of their crops, treatment, packing, transportation to preselected warehouses and appropriate storage.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: Support in harvest provided Treatment ensured packing ensured Transportation to preselected warehouses provided Appropriate storage set up

comment.narrative: No geospatial data available for livelihoods
